footer.tagline: Your trusted platform for buying and selling cars

about.title: About Us
about.content1: Cheetah is your ultimate destination for buying and selling cars easily, quickly, and securely.
about.content2: Our platform connects car sellers with potential buyers through a user-friendly and intuitive interface.
about.content3: With features like image galleries, reviews, and multi-language support, Cheetah makes car trading more accessible to everyone.
about.content4: Whether you're a private seller or a dealership, we provide tools to help you showcase your vehicles and reach more customers.
